description:
Give yourself some peace of mind with a 14mm steel ULock. The Evolution Standard is updated with features designed to keep your bike right where you left it.

  • Primary key has an LED light fob attached
  • Includes 2 replacement keys, covered by Kryptonite optional Key Safe Program for stress-free replacements
  • Double deadbolt design prevent twisting or one-cut attempts
  • Disc style cylinder is resists drilling or attempts to pick it
  • Flexframe-U bracket provides mounting options
  • Vinyl coating protects your bike’s paint
  • Dust cover protects mechanism and keeps it functioning
name: Kryptonite Evolution Standard U-Lock
